segments.text: Look at that, the sink is completely overflowing!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascades down like a waterfall in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn't even glance at it, focused on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's in the puddle, but carries on drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over there, the boy's climbing high on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's leaning back so far; I hold my breath watching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies from the jar with one hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands below, arm up like she's next in line.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They must think Mom's not paying attention at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window frames a lovely garden scene outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight highlights the cookies in the jar so temptingly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how much can happen in one room unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the stool will hold just a bit longer.
segments.speaker: PAR
